item.description:
** For those who RSVP'd previously, the change in Organizers cleared the slate, so please say "YES" one more time!

If the event fills up and you are interested, RSVP "NO" and note that you'd like to be wait listed. I'll let you know if space opens up!

Join us for a late summer Sunday evening on De Pasquale Plaza. Geppetto's is an upscale pizzeria, know for its grilled pizzas and also featuring appetizers, salads, pastas and more! Check out their website. We'll start at 6:00 pm, allowing for a leisurely, casual meal -- and still getting home early to be fresh Monday morning!

If we are graced with a lovely evening, we will dine outdoors and enjoy the ambiance of the fountain and cafes. If the weather is less favorable, we'll be seated indoors.

We will continue the practice of asking for two checks -- one for food, one for beverages. We will divide the food bill equally and pass the bar tab around for each to pay for what they drink (plus tax & tip).

Look forward to good food and great conversation!
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation under "Charlene" - small place; you'll find us!

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Sunday Night Pizza! Geppetto's Pizzeria
